LanguageData.AA_InvisibleArcticLion.label: stalking
LanguageData.AA_InvisibleArcticLion.description: This arctic lion is stalking its prey and... Hey, how are you reading this, you cheater??
LanguageData.AA_CrushingEverything.label: crushing everything on its path
LanguageData.AA_CrushingEverything.description: If I were you, I wouldn't get in the path of a rampaging Summit Crab...
LanguageData.AA_Nocturnal.label: nocturnal animal
LanguageData.AA_Nocturnal.description: Deprecated nocturnal animal Hediff. This shouldn't ever appear ingame.
LanguageData.AA_LockJawDisease.description: A painful and uncomfortable disease that inflamates the jaw, making it very hard to eat or talk. The disease will go away after it has been sucessfully treated a set number of times.
LanguageData.AA_LockJawDisease.label: lockjaw disease
LanguageData.AA_Paralysis.description: A fast acting toxin is coursing through this creature's veins, paralyzing his muscles. It will wear off after a while.
LanguageData.AA_Paralysis.label: paralysis
LanguageData.AA_Paralysis.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.AA_Paralysis.stages.1.label: stunned
LanguageData.AA_Paralysis.stages.2.label: very stunned
LanguageData.AA_Paralysis.stages.3.label: paralysed
LanguageData.AA_Electric.description: A dangerous electric shock. It might have damaged the heart, and the higher the intensity the hgher the possibility of a heart attack.
LanguageData.AA_Electric.label: electric shock
LanguageData.AA_Electric.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.AA_Electric.stages.1.label: shocked
LanguageData.AA_Electric.stages.2.label: very shocked
LanguageData.AA_Electric.stages.3.label: paralysed
LanguageData.AA_ToxicBuildup.description: Toxins in the bloodstream. This can come from various sources, including environmental toxins, venomous bites, or poisoned weapons. \nAt high doses, toxic buildup is lethal. Even at low doses, it can generate cancers. \nContrary to base game toxic buildup, creatures who die with this toxic damage can be eaten.
LanguageData.AA_ToxicBuildup.label: toxic buildup
LanguageData.AA_ToxicBuildup.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.AA_ToxicBuildup.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.AA_ToxicBuildup.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.AA_ToxicBuildup.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.AA_ToxicBuildup.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.AA_ToxicBuildup.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.AA_AcidBuildup.label: acid burn
LanguageData.AA_AcidBuildup.description: A splash of acid that continues to cause burn wounds for quite some time after the initial attack.
LanguageData.AA_AcidBuildup.stages.0.label: minor, receiving burns
LanguageData.AA_AcidBuildup.stages.1.label: moderate, receiving burns
LanguageData.AA_AcidBuildup.stages.2.label: serious, receiving burns
LanguageData.AA_LowRest.description: This creature has very little need for sleep, and can stay awake for a long time.
LanguageData.AA_LowRest.label: needs very little sleep
LanguageData.AA_PsionicallyNuzzled.label: psionically nuzzled
LanguageData.AA_GatheredResource.description: This colonist has recently gathered an animal resource.
LanguageData.AA_GatheredResource.label: gathered animal resource
LanguageData.AA_CorpseFeast.description: This Helixien slug has recently fed on human corpses. The tastiest meat.
LanguageData.AA_CorpseFeast.label: feasted on human corpses
LanguageData.AA_AteFinestClothes.description: This Angel Moth has recently consumed clothes of Legendary quality.
LanguageData.AA_AteFinestClothes.label: feasted on legendary clothing
LanguageData.AA_RechargingBatteries.description: This TetraSlug has recently recharged a nearby battery.
LanguageData.AA_RechargingBatteries.label: recharging batteries
LanguageData.AA_FertilizedTerrain.description: This Sand Squid has recently fertilized some sandy terrain.
LanguageData.AA_FertilizedTerrain.label: fertilized terrain
LanguageData.AA_SwarmlingImplantation.label: swarmling implantation
LanguageData.AA_SwarmlingImplantation.description: Affected by Swarmling implantation. If the disease is not properly treated, or if the creature dies when it is sufficiently advanced, Swarmling larvae will devour it from inside and hatch from its corpse.
LanguageData.AA_SwarmlingImplantation.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.AA_SwarmlingImplantation.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.AA_SwarmlingImplantation.stages.2.label: extreme
LanguageData.AA_SwarmlingImplantation.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.AA_AcidBurn.label: acid burn
LanguageData.AA_Resurrection.label: rise from your grave!
LanguageData.AA_Resurrection.description: This animal can survive up to 9 fatal wounds, coming back from the dead.
LanguageData.AA_MimeHediff.label: hiding in plain sight
LanguageData.AA_MimeHediff.description: This colonist may not be a real person after all...
LanguageData.AA_BurrowingUnderSand.description: This Sand Prowler is burrowing under the sand, making it very resistant to damage. I hate sand. Its course, and ruff, and irritating. And it gets everywhere.
LanguageData.AA_BurrowingUnderSand.label: burrowing under sand
LanguageData.AA_VirulentFungalInfection.label: virulent fungal infection
LanguageData.AA_VirulentFungalInfection.description: Fungal infection in a wound. Without treatment, the infection will advance at an astonishing rate, killing the afflicted in a few hours. Luckily, it is very easy to treat, and it will be kept contained and disappear as long as a medic treats it fast and with a decent treatment quality.
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight1.description: This creature can carry extra weight both while hauling and on caravans.
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight1.label: extra carry weight (awful)
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight2.description: This creature can carry extra weight both while hauling and on caravans.
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight2.label: extra carry weight (poor)
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight3.description: This creature can carry extra weight both while hauling and on caravans.
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight3.label: extra carry weight (normal)
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight4.description: This creature can carry extra weight both while hauling and on caravans.
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight4.label: extra carry weight (good)
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight5.description: This creature can carry extra weight both while hauling and on caravans.
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight5.label: extra carry weight (excellent)
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight6.description: This creature can carry extra weight both while hauling and on caravans.
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight6.label: extra carry weight (masterwork)
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight7.description: This creature can carry extra weight both while hauling and on caravans.
LanguageData.AA_CarryWeight7.label: extra carry weight (legendary)
LanguageData.AA_PermanentBurn.label: permanent burn
LanguageData.AA_PermanentBurn.description: A permanent burn scar that cannot be treated.
LanguageData.AA_LightSustenance.description: This creature feeds on sunlight. Inadequate levels of light will kill it.
LanguageData.AA_LightSustenance.label: level of sunlight
LanguageData.AA_LightSustenance.stages.0.label: adequate light
LanguageData.AA_LightSustenance.stages.1.label: poor light levels
LanguageData.AA_LightSustenance.stages.2.label: very low light levels
LanguageData.AA_LightSustenance.stages.3.label: lack of sunlight
LanguageData.AA_LightSustenance.stages.4.label: extreme lack of sustenance
LanguageData.AA_MutantLeg.description: This leg seems to be covered in a slick secretion that constantly drips from every pore. Something seems... off about it, as if it wasn't a completely natural creation.
LanguageData.AA_MutantLeg.label: mutant leg
LanguageData.AA_MutantArm.label: mutant arm
LanguageData.AA_MutantArm.description: This arm twitches and bends in strange unnatural ways, as if it had a mind of its own. Something seems... off about it, as if it wasn't a completely natural creation.
LanguageData.AA_MutantArm.comps.0.tools.0.label: fist
LanguageData.AA_MutantEye.label: mutant eye
LanguageData.AA_MutantEye.description: This eye constantly blinks on its own, like a nervous tic, and a second set of vertical eyelids seems to be present behind the normal, human ones. Something seems... off about it, as if it wasn't a completely natural creation.
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticTentacle.label: simple prosthetic tentacle
LanguageData.AA_BionicTentacle.label: bionic tentacle
LanguageData.AA_BionicTentacle.comps.0.tools.0.label: bionic tentacle
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticBeak.label: simple prosthetic beak
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticBeak.comps.0.tools.0.label: prosthetic beak
LanguageData.AA_BionicBeak.label: bionic beak
LanguageData.AA_BionicBeak.comps.0.tools.0.label: bionic beak
LanguageData.AA_BionicMotionDetector.label: bionic motion detector
LanguageData.AA_BionicMotionDetector.description: Improved bionic motion detector for animals. This motion detector replaces echolocation organs and vibration sensors.
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticBuoyancyMechanism.label: simple prosthetic buoyancy mechanism
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticBuoyancyMechanism.descripti: Simple prosthetic buoyancy mechanism. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.
LanguageData.AA_BionicBuoyancyMechanism.label: bionic buoyancy mechanism
LanguageData.AA_BionicBuoyancyMechanism.description: Improved bionic buoyancy mechanism for animals. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticShell.label: simple prosthetic shell
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticShell.description: Simple prosthetic shell. Should be able to replace carapaces and shells.
LanguageData.AA_BionicShell.label: bionic shell
LanguageData.AA_BionicShell.description: Improved bionic shell for animals. Should be able to replace carapaces and shells.
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticWing.label: simple prosthetic wing
LanguageData.AA_ProstheticWing.description: Simple prosthetic wing. Should be able to replace any type of wing.
LanguageData.AA_BionicWing.label: bionic wing
LanguageData.AA_BionicWing.description: Improved bionic wing for animals. Should be able to replace any type of wing.
LanguageData.AB_SimpleProstheticClaw.label: simple prosthetic claw
LanguageData.AB_SimpleProstheticClaw.description: Simple prosthetic claw. Fits animals with sharpened claws.
LanguageData.AB_BionicClaw.label: bionic claw
LanguageData.AB_BionicClaw.description: Improved bionic claw. Fits animals with sharpened claws.
LanguageData.AB_BionicClaw.comps.0.tools.0.label: bionic claw
LanguageData.AA_GooAcidifier.label: goo acidifier
LanguageData.AA_GooAcidifier.description: A goo acidifier increases the acidity of a goo's internal organs, making it explode as soon as it is downed. Basically transforms goos into biological suicide bombers.
LanguageData.AA_RangedSpinneretImplant.label: ranged spinneret implant
LanguageData.AA_RangedSpinneretImplant.description: An installed ranged spinneret implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.
LanguageData.AA_VenomousSpitterImplant.label: venomous spitter implant
LanguageData.AA_VenomousSpitterImplant.description: An installed venomous spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).
LanguageData.AA_AcidicSpitterImplant.label: acidic spitter implant
LanguageData.AA_AcidicSpitterImplant.description: An installed acidic spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic spit attack that causes additional damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).
LanguageData.AA_BarbedQuillThrowerImplant.label: barbed quill thrower implant
LanguageData.AA_BarbedQuillThrowerImplant.description: An installed barbed quill thrower implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack that causes toxic buildup.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a barbed quill thrower will have no effect.
LanguageData.AA_QuadTeslaCannonImplant.label: quad tesla cannon implant
LanguageData.AA_QuadTeslaCannonImplant.description: An installed quad tesla cannon implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.
